description: Full-width strip with a rich text message and one or two call-to-action buttons. Use Optimizely content scheduling for auto-expiry.

message.description: Primary message text. Supports inline HTML (bold, links, etc.).

primaryCtaLabel.description: Text for the primary action button

primaryCtaUrl.description: Destination URL for the primary action button

secondaryCtaLabel.description: Text for the optional secondary action button. Leave blank to show only the primary CTA.

secondaryCtaUrl.description: Destination URL for the secondary action button
